summary: This is a brief email from July 15, 2019, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's new legal representation. It indicates that attorneys Chris Everdell and Mark Cohen from the firm Cohen & Gresser will be representing her, with a meeting scheduled at the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Chris Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser who will be representing Ghislaine Maxwell, as indicated by his cell phone being provided for contact.

persons.name: Mark Cohen
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser who will be representing Ghislaine Maxwell at the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, who is obtaining new legal representation from the law firm Cohen & Gresser.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at the law firm Cohen & Gresser and are working together to represent Ghislaine Maxwell.
Chris Everdell is part of the legal team from Cohen & Gresser representing Ghislaine Maxwell.
Mark Cohen is part of the legal team from Cohen & Gresser representing Ghislaine Maxwell at SDNY.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's Legal Representation Meeting
events.description: Attorneys Chris Everdell and Mark Cohen from Cohen & Gresser are scheduled to represent Ghislaine Maxwell, with a meeting at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) around 4:30 PM or after.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell obtained new legal representation from the law firm Cohen & Gresser in July 2019.
Attorneys Chris Everdell and Mark Cohen were the specific lawyers assigned to represent her.
A meeting was scheduled for July 16, 2019, at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) around 4:30 PM.
This document shows a key moment in Maxwell's legal proceedings as she secured defense counsel.
